Description.Text: The Plymouth is a small charming luxury hotel of South Beach, featuring 110 bedrooms and suites within 4 stories of a historical restored art deco building in Miami Beach's Collins Park neighborhood. The first hotel to offer a true boutique design centric experience. At The Plymouth every little detail is met and every service is provided. The Plymouth is hidden in privacy but just steps away from it all.

The Plymouth is located right in the center of South Beach's Collins Park, also known as Museum Historic District in Miami Beach. The quaint neighborhood is rich in its roots and culture and is known to have best (or finest) options of restaurants, cafes, museums, and boutiques. Here you are just a few blocks away from everything you come to South Beach for: the Beach, Collins Ave and Lincoln Road, The Miami Beach Convention Center, The Fillmore, and more!
Breakfast, lunch and dinner are served at this hotel.
This accommodation has a very small lobby.
